tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Terrible professor. Most stubborn person Ive ever met. Expects everyone in the class to be a professional artist. Does NOT acknowledge less talented students despite all the effort they put into something.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  TOUGH GRADER
comments: This was by far the hardest class Ive taken. He expects way more time on each piece than the other teachers in the subject, grades really harshly, and won\'t hesitate to make you cry in front of everyone. BUT my drawing improved so much each week that I can\'t even recognize my work from the first week. If you can commit, this class is amazing

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I don\'t recommend this teacher at all. Didn\'t receive a syllabus until several weeks into the class, very unclear about exactly what he wants until he criticizes students in front of the class, late almost every class, and doesn\'t give you time to ask for improvement until too late. MUCH MORE to say, but not enough characters to say it. DONT TAKE!!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: I had zero drawing skills. By the fifth week, I learned to draw. I got an A in the class but it was the hardest class I\'ve ever taken. Expect to put in 16+ hours per long homework assignment. Chris is a great professor, but he expects you to work. I would recommend this class to anyone who wants to learn or improve and is serious about art.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Treated his class like it was the only class we were all enrolled in and very demanding. He will tell you that you\'re on the right track and then change his mind later on. Showed up late sometimes, expect to be working in the studio for 15 hours a week if you want to barely pass.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: He gives unclear instructions and unclear due dates. If you didn\'t do a project exactly how he wants it, he\'ll chew you out and degrade your art for 10-15 minutes in front of the class (yes this happens on multiple occasions). He\'s late about 75% of the time (once even forgetting he had a class go teach and another bc he was looking at art).

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Sleeping over in the studio was the norm for some during Summer A. He\'s funny, straightforward, and made a lot of girls cry... I even had more than 10 seizures from the stress.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: If you ask for help he is very willing to help you. If you sit in a corner and expect things to handed to you, this is not the class for you. I took him along with Ahearn and improved a lot. UCF\'s soph portfolio is a very competitive program to even get into. I suggest if you want to be the best that you can be and put in effort, take him.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Expect to put a lot of time outside of class completing projects, just as any other studio class. The amount of "homework" is comparable to drawing courses. Do not procrastinate. If you put in the time, effort, and creativity you will have an easier time getting help.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: He is a really good teacher. HE IS VERY SARCASTIC! I feel like a lot of people misread his sarcasm for being mean. Yes, he says your work sucks but then the next class he says its amazing and how well you have improved. You have to put the time in or he won\'t help you. He doesn\'t have patience for laziness, AT ALL. Good teacher, learned a lot.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Extremely great teacher. Its a studio class so that means about 8-12 hours of drawing HW per week.If your lazy, leave this class and dropout of college. If you want to learn to draw, HE\'s your guy. Not an easy A. If you can\'t draw he WILL TEACH you to draw realistically. I was able to get an A. funny dude. HOT!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: He knows his stuff, doesn\'t mean he\'ll just give you the answer-you have to work for it. He helps students that are genuinely putting effort into learning what material is being taught, but that doesn\'t stop you from finding your own style/subject in the drawing class. No bull kind of teacher, and really does care for students and their work.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: His homework assignments require alot of work and can become confusing since he explains them very quickly in the last few minutes of class. Getting a good critique from him his hard because he wants you to ask him the questions you have about your drawing. He doesn\'t just tell you what you need to do to help your drawing.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I wouldn\'t recommend this professor unless you live on or near campus and happen to have a really thick skin. He does not appreciate it when you disagree with him on what art is. According to him, I have also apparently gotten worse at drawing, which really shouldn\'t be possible after taking a class and years of dedication to art. Avoid if you can.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: He is the worst teacher ever! he is rude to students and doesnt help also he is bad at drawing and he cant teach a damn thing. he yells he screams he gets angry. A student in my class asked for help, he came over and said this is****, and didnt even help the student! thats not a teacher!!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I had him with Rivers (I signed up for the class hoping to get Haran *they switch on you sometimes*). Anyways I thought he was pretty good. It was refreshing when I had him instead of Rivers. He didn\'t teach much of the class (maybe why he hasn\'t been horribly rude), but I wished he taught more. Got a B+. I am glad I had 2 teachers & 2 dif viewpnts

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Great teacher. He\'s very helpful when you don\'t understand a concept. Personally I think he has \'mental issues\' and says inappropriate things but hes a funny guy. Don\'t hate on the class!! The formula they teach here is very effective for those with an open mind.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: This class is a nightmare. The whole class is teaching you this ONE way of contour drawing & if you don\'t learn it you basically fail. This teacher uses so many weird analogies you have no idea what he is talking about. It is true he is rude to students. I passed, but I will never take another drawing class as UCF.. will make you hate drawing.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: The other comments say it best... This is by far the worst professor I had, in terms of personality. He screams, and he belittles people every chance he gets. Not a personality that is conducive to a learning environment. Where is the negative rating, -10.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Honest; not the easiest to get along with. However when it comes to drawing there is no better professor (and I HATED drawing). Thomas and I butted heads (understatement) but at the end of the semester I COULD DRAW!
